Package net.abi.abisEngine.rendering.shader

Class GLSLUniformBlockBuffer

java.lang.Object
net.abi.abisEngine.rendering.shader.GLBuffer
net.abi.abisEngine.rendering.shader.GLSLUniformBlockBuffer
public class GLSLUniformBlockBuffer
extends GLBuffer
Uniform Buffer Object. The class representing a Uniform block in GL memory. NOTE: A UBO should be created before the shader is compiled. TODO: Have a UBO in multiple contexts represented by only one of these classes. By having a TwoFactorCache to store GLContexts.
Author:
Abinash Singh

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int binding
    The binding of the UBO as defined by the user so it can be bound and identified by the compiler.s
    private int ID
    The ID of the created UBO in the GL Context.
    private java.lang.String name
    The defined name of the block.
    static int NULL_BOUND_UNIFORM_BUFFER_OBJECT
    A engine specific null FLAG, If the ID variable of a GLSLUniformBlockObject is equal to this than it will be considered as non existent in the current GL Context.s
    private int size
    The size in Bytes of the entirety of the block.
    static int UNIFORM_BUFFER_GL_TYPE
    A Constant to store the GLInt type of this buffer.
    private GLSLUniform[] uniforms
    A array of the uniforms in the block.

    Fields inherited from class net.abi.abisEngine.rendering.shader.GLBuffer

    NULL_BOUND_BUFFER_OBJECT

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addData​(java.nio.Buffer buffer)  
    void bind()
    Binds the buffer to its ID, if the ID is NULL_BOUND_UNIFORM_BUFFER_OBJECT then it returns and does'nt execute GL31.glBindBuffer(int, int) to bind this buffer, without throwing a error.

    Creates a GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER with the specified size in bytes.

  • Field Details

    • UNIFORM_BUFFER_GL_TYPE

      public static final int UNIFORM_BUFFER_GL_TYPE
      A Constant to store the GLInt type of this buffer.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • NULL_BOUND_UNIFORM_BUFFER_OBJECT

      public static final int NULL_BOUND_UNIFORM_BUFFER_OBJECT
      A engine specific null FLAG, If the ID variable of a GLSLUniformBlockObject is equal to this than it will be considered as non existent in the current GL Context.s
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • ID

      private int ID
      The ID of the created UBO in the GL Context. This is defaulted to NULL_BOUND_UNIFORM_BUFFER_OBJECT so that the system can recognize that it yet exist in the context.

    • binding

      private int binding
      The binding of the UBO as defined by the user so it can be bound and identified by the compiler.s

    • size

      private int size
      The size in Bytes of the entirety of the block.

    • name

      private java.lang.String name
      The defined name of the block. Not the instance name, there is no use for it outside the shader code.

    • uniforms

      private GLSLUniform[] uniforms
      A array of the uniforms in the block. The index of the uniform in this array is the same as the index in the block in GLSL.

  • Constructor Details

    • GLSLUniformBlockBuffer

      public GLSLUniformBlockBuffer​(int usage, int size)
      Creates a GLBuffer of type Uniform Buffer.
      Parameters:
      usage -
      size -

    • GLSLUniformBlockBuffer

      public GLSLUniformBlockBuffer​(int size)
      Creates a GLBuffer of type Uniform Buffer. With GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW usage.
      Parameters:
      size -

  • Method Details

    • create

      public int create​(int size)
      Creates a GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER with the specified size in bytes. After the function completes execution it will un-bind the buffer to NULL_BOUND_UNIFORM_BUFFER_OBJECT.

    • bind

      public void bind()
      Binds the buffer to its ID, if the ID is NULL_BOUND_UNIFORM_BUFFER_OBJECT then it returns and does'nt execute GL31.glBindBuffer(int, int) to bind this buffer, without throwing a error.
      Overrides:
      bind in class GLBuffer

    • unbind

      public void unbind()
      Simply calls GL31.glBindBuffer(int, int) with a 0 as the buffer index.
      Overrides:
      unbind in class GLBuffer

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the defined size of this block in number of bytes
      Overrides:
      getSize in class GLBuffer
      Returns:
      size

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the ID of this defined block after it is created. If the block is not yet created then NULL_BOUND_UNIFORM_BUFFER_OBJECT is returned by default.
      Returns:
      ID The ID of the buffer or NULL_BOUND_UNIFORM_BUFFER_OBJECT

    • setId

      public void setId​(int id)
      Parameters:
      id - the id to set this buffer to.

    • getBinding

      public int getBinding()
      Returns:

    • addData

      public void addData​(java.nio.Buffer buffer)
      Specified by:
      addData in class GLBuffer
